short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate course registration on McGill's Minerva platform during Add/Drop period. Save time by automating the registration process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome extension to automate course registration on McGill's Minerva platform.

How to Use:
1. Login and navigate to the Quick Add/Drop page on Minerva
2. Click the extension icon in your browser
3. Enter your CRNs (one per line) and set check frequency
4. Click "Start Auto-Registration"

The extension will automatically attempt to register for your courses at the specified interval.

Note: 
• All data is stored locally on your device
• Works only on McGill's Minerva platform
• Not affiliated with McGill University
